author: Lucas Nolan, Lucas Nolan
title: Coronavirus: Facebook Removes Post by Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro
description: Shortly after Twitter removed a post about the coronavirus pandemic by Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro, Facebook followed suit also removing the president's post from its platform as well.
content:
Shortly after Twitter removed a post about the coronavirus pandemic by Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro, Facebook followed suit also removing the president’s post from its platform as well.
